email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 50,000 MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Michael Lewis

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel OCEAN TRADER, which has a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 225m. The starting freight quote is USD 25 per ton. The laycan dates are flexible between December 1st and December 10th. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 25 per ton seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you revise the quote to USD 22 per ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Michael Lewis

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Revised Quote
email_chain.body:
Michael,

I understand your concerns. After reviewing the market, I can offer a revised freight quote of USD 23 per ton. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day. Please let me know if this revised offer meets your requirements.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Revised Quote
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

Thank you for the revised quote. USD 23 per ton is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking for the OCEAN TRADER with laycan dates between December 1st and December 10th. Could you send over the contract details for review?

Best regards,
Michael Lewis

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Contract Details
email_chain.body:
Michael,

Great to hear that the revised quote works for you. I have attached the contract details for your review. Please confirm once you've reviewed and we can proceed with the finalization.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Contract Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

I have reviewed the contract details and everything looks good. Please proceed with the finalization. Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Michael Lewis
